item.title: What colors should I use for my brand?
item.dc:creator: Kelley Melgarejo
item.description:
It is important to understand that how consumers feel about a brand has more power than what they think about a brand. Your brand colors have the ability to impact your sales and performance more than the products you offer. Consistency and repetition with the same colors can strengthen brand awareness because when given enough […]
